name: Baekhyun EXO Dashboard Theme
description:
EXO's Baekhyun in a compact dashboard theme! Complete with a cursor, a "baekhyun." logo replacing the tumblr logo, and Baekhyun's light symbol replacing the dashboard button. Full credit to their rightful owners ((except the background because I made that ouo)). All in one theme.

note ; there's a little glitch where the baekhyun symbol... pretty much replaces the symbol of every website for some reason o-o like if you went on youtube, the youtube symbol in the top corner would be replaced, but i dont think that's much of a problem to most of you, is it? ouo

user.name: apotheosis
user.about: Requests? Just send me an ask on my tumblr and I'll see what I can do.
